properties.body:
LAPTEV SEA.
RUSSIA.
DNC 27.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V GEOLOG DMITRIY NALIVKIN
   TOWING 8100 METER LONG CABLE IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 76-49.4N 120-50.8E, 76-49.4N 123-59.3E,
      74-17.3N 123-58.6E, 74-09.4N 113-58.5E,
      75-31.1N 114-44.8E.
   B. 76-49.4N 123-59.3E, 76-49.4N 129-54.0E,
      74-28.2N 130-24.8E, 74-17.3N 123-58.6E.
EIGHT MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
